about_the_game:
Incarnus Warfare depicts a realistic war conflict between two superpowers, Herital and Praetorian, on the planet Incarnus. The game prioritizes immersion, with every aspect - visuals, audio, gameplay, combat, worldbuilding, and lore - designed to deeply immerse players into the role of a commander of a professional military task force.

This classic real-time strategy game features unit combat and base building, with a moderate pace that is not heavily dependent on actions per minute (APM). Currently in the prototype phase, the completed game will include two factions, Herital and Praetorian, each with their own campaign. Additional features will include a skirmish mode, local multiplayer, and online multiplayer with a competitive ranked ladder.

The ultimate mission of Incarnus Warfare is to bring back the classic, golden era of RTS games with worlds and stories so immersive that players really feel like they are there, taking part in the war as a commander.

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts fictional futuristic war conflict, so violence of war combat is to be expected.

name: Incarnus Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 6-Core 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060/Radeon RX 580, 4GB+ VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 8-Core 4.6GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2070/Radeon 5700 XT, 8GB+ VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Incarnus Warfare is a classic real-time strategy featuring moderate-scale unit combat and base building. The game focuses heavily on immersion in every aspect. Forget the real world around you, and once again, become a commander of a military task force, just like in your childhood.
